attributes.action: TO STOP TONY BLAIR ATTENDING MILITARY REMEMBRANCE SERVICES
attributes.background: BECAUSE OF TONY BLAIR BACKSTABBING UK MILITARY TROOPS ON NI PEACE KEEPING AGREEMENT OP BANNER, I WOULD LIKE HIM BANNED FROM ALL MILITARY SERVICES, AS HE IS NOT WELCOMED BY ANY BRITISH FORCES UK.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
